name: t-SNE
description: t-Distributed Stochastic Neighbor Embedding: is a method for constructing a low dimensional embedding of high-dimensional data.

properties.name: initial_dims
properties.description: The number of dimensions that should be retained in the initial PCA step

properties.name: theta
properties.description: Speed/accuracy trade-off (increase for less accuracy), set to 0.0 for exact TSNE

properties.name: pca
properties.description: Whether an initial PCA step should be performed

properties.name: pca_center
properties.description: Should data be centered before pca is applied ?

properties.name: pca_scale
properties.description: Should data be scaled before pca is applied ?

properties.name: stop_lying_iter
properties.description: Iteration after which the perplexities are no longer exaggerated

properties.name: mom_switch_iter
properties.description: Iteration after which the final momentum is used

properties.name: momentum
properties.description: Momentum used in the first part of the optimization

properties.name: final_momentum
properties.description: Momentum used in the final part of the optimization

properties.name: exaggeration_factor
properties.description: Exaggeration factor used to multiply the P matrix in the first part of the optimization

properties.name: seed
properties.description: Set the seed number. if less than 0, set a Random seed
